snippet.title: Arma 3 Creator DLC: Global Mobilization - Cold War Germany Trailer
snippet.description:
OUT NOW - Bohemia Interactive and third-party developer Vertexmacht are proud to present the first #Arma3 Creator DLC: Global Mobilization - Cold War Germany! http://www.arma3.com/dlc/creator

This new content pack takes Arma back to the 1980s, and deploys you to northern Germany. Fight on an all-new 419 km² terrain with 42 new vehicles and vehicle variants, 21 new weapons including variants, and a ton of additional character assets. The DLC also features a 10-mission singleplayer campaign and 17 multiplayer scenarios.

Buy Global Mobilization - Cold War Germany:
Steam - https://store.steampowered.com/app/1042220
Bohemia Store - https://store.bistudio.com/products/arma3-global-mobilization

Global Mobilization is released as Arma 3 Creator DLC, which means it's made by a third-party developer (Vertexmacht) and published by Bohemia Interactive. In case you'd like to know more about our Creator DLC initiative, be sure to take a look at our answers to some of the most Frequently Asked Questions: http://www.arma3.com/dlc/creator#FAQ

About Arma 3
Experience true combat gameplay in a massive military sandbox. Authentic, diverse, open – Arma 3 sends you to war.

Check out our official store ➡ https://store.bistudio.com/

Facebook - http://www.facebook.com/ArmaPlatform
Twitter - http://twitter.com/ArmaPlatform
YouTube - http://youtube.com/ArmaPlatform
Steam - http://steamcommunity.com/app/107410

Trailer Credits
Footage, editing, and music by Vertexmacht.
